Name: ARIA: Genesis
About the game: Aria Genesis Is a Single Developer Project Enjoy intense 3rd Person Shooter Missions Five gorgeous playable babes use their high powered arsenal to blast through elite operatives, mechs, and aliens in the challenging, fast paced, 3rd person shooter missions spread across the game's storyline. Experience multiple sinfully spicy sex animations Each one carefully nurtured with it's own set of static and free camera options. There's partial clothing based on the current outfit, and a slew of additional interactive options. You will enjoy every pixel of this 3D degenerate action. Soar through the sky in Flight simulator Combat Missions Every hot sci-fi babe needs a sweet spaceship, right? Well maybe not, but you get one anyway. Remember to shoot down the turrets on the orbital installations while you’re up there. Enjoy tons of “extra” optional goodies Unlock oodles of sexy outfits to savor with your lustful eyes Dominate Arena missions by getting the fastest times for any challenge seekers out there. Become a Drag Queen (the racing kind not the other one.) With the optional drag race minigame Practice some totally wholesome nude yoga Work the pole at your local club Duel in a battle card minigame Collect secret erotic pinup magazines collectables (yes you can read them)
